adapters.name: adapter-f5_bigiq
adapters.overview: Adapter that integrates with F5 BIG-IQ

capabilities.capability: Upgrades F5 BIG-IP device over BIG-IQ API
Provides option to upload iHealth task before and after upgrade
Verify sufficient disk space exists on BIG-IP for upgrade
Performs rollback to volume prior to upgrade if upgrade fails
Does device discovery and import after upgrade
Supports upgrade of HA pair of devices as well as upgrade of single device
Updates device upgrade task to include private keys

inputs.name: deviceAData
inputs.description: Set of values for device A in HA pair to upgrade

inputs.name: deviceBData
inputs.description: Set of values for device B in HA pair to upgrade. If no second device, leave values as empty string

inputs.name: deviceAData.deviceManagementAddress
inputs.description: IP address of BIG-IP for license re-activation. If using deviceManagementHostname for license re-activation, leave this value empty as ""

inputs.name: deviceAData.deviceManagementPort
inputs.description: Port of BIG-IP for license re-activation. If using deviceManagementHostname for license re-activation, leave this value empty as ""

inputs.name: deviceAData.deviceManagementHostname
inputs.description: Hostname of BIG-IP for license re-activation. If using deviceManagementAddress and deviceManagementPort for license re-activation, leave this value empty as ""

inputs.name: deviceAData.machineIdFilterProperty
inputs.description: The property to use to search for BIG-IP machine ID

inputs.name: deviceAData.machineIdFilterValue
inputs.description: The value to use to search for BIG-IP machine Id

inputs.name: deviceAData.targetVolume
inputs.description: Target volume on BIG-IP device to use for upgrade

inputs.name: credentialsFilterValue
inputs.description: Value to use to search for credential used in iHealth task upload. If not performing iHealth task upload, assign value ""

inputs.name: credentialsFilterProperty
inputs.description: Property to use to search for credential used in iHealth task upload. If not performing iHealth task upload, assign value ""

inputs.name: adapterId
inputs.description: IAP adapter to use to send requests to F5 BIG-IQ for automation

inputs.name: deviceBackupLifeTime
inputs.description: The number of days to keep backup file on BIG-IQ

inputs.name: deviceBackupDescription
inputs.description: Description to associate with device file backup

inputs.name: iHealthTaskName
inputs.description: The name to give to iHealth task name

inputs.name: importDeviceTaskName
inputs.description: Name of task for importing device to BIG-IQ

inputs.name: softwareUpgradeTaskName
inputs.description: Name of task for software upgrade

inputs.name: softwareImageName
inputs.description: Image on BIG-IQ to use for software upgrade

inputs.name: uploadiHealthTask
inputs.description: Value used to determine whether or not to do iHealth upload. If true, performs iHealth upload before and after upgrade and if false, skips both iHealth upload steps.

inputs.name: deviceRebootWait
inputs.description: Amount of time in seconds to wait for device to reboot in the event a rollback is performed

outputs.name: returnStatus
outputs.description: This value is assigned "SUCCESS" if the device upgrade succeeded and is assigned "FAILED" if any step of the device upgrade failed
